title: cmd/go import syntax error reporting improvement
body:
If one forgets to make the import statement a string, for example in 
http://play.golang.org/p/yo5VXRK_Ue ) , the error message is "prog.go:3: syntax
error: unexpected semicolon or newline, expecting string literal", or in 1.1beta2,
"expected 'STRING', found newline". This is correct, but it would be more
informative if it could say "No package path found after alias in import
statement", or something of that flavor.
